entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY ENDED, Sudbury (Greater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:42 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 11:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -12.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -16.0°C
Wind: NW 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then light overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 60 percent chance of flurries later in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
